archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0955
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want the ability to apply payments in bulk to either one or many accounts so that payments are allocated correctly and suspense account reduces

properties.value: Requirement clear. Spliting rules to be provided. There is possibility that employee will have to pay for spefic services. Sample: Company pays for main subscription (call, data, roaming) and employee pays for add-ons like Netflix. Comarch has to match payment to proper service.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
